snippet.title: Meme Lordz Founder/CEO:  Game Introduction Overview & Tutorial
snippet.description:
#NftGaming #PlayToEarn #MemeToEarn #BlockchainGame #FreeToPlay #CryptoGame #RPG

CEO & lead gamer designer Ryan Smith runs through a brief overview of the Meme Lordz game.

This tutorial includes:

0:00 : Intro
0:52 : Setting up MetaMask 
3:19 : Connecting to the BSC Network
6:29 : Creating a Meme Lordz account
8:49 : Controls 
9:09 : Selecting starting Meme Lordz
10:48 : In game menu overview
12:00 : First Battle 
16:00 : Healing your Meme Lordz 
16:23 : Capturing wild Meme Lordz
18:09 : The Meme stream & Cleansing Meme Lordz 
21:54 : Assigning new moves to Meme Lordz
23:40 : Minting Meme Lordz to NFTs 
26:55 : Viewing NFTs on Lootex

PLAY NOW: https://beta.memelordz.io

https://memelordz.io
